card.name: Bolgalshack, Super Divine Dragoon
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Dragons or Tyranno Drake. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, if it's put on top of a Tyranno Drake, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 4000 or less. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, if the card under it is a Dragon, you may destroy one of your opponent's non-Armored Dragon or non-Tyranno Drake creatures that has less power than this creature. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Gantora Maxivus
card.text: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Kenji Panda Nelra, Tyrannical Shogun
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Dreammates. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a non-evolution Dreammate or Vehicle Bee, you may put it into the battle zone. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Endra Pappi
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Whenever you put an Angel Command or a Dragon into the battle zone, you may draw a card.

card.name: Bolpheus Heaven, Super Holy Dragon
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Vortex evolution—Put on 2 of your Angel Commands and/or Armored Dragons. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may cast a light or fire spell in your hand For No Cost ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may put one of your shields into your graveyard. If you do, destroy any number of your opponent's creatures that have total power 6000 or less. ■ Triple Breaker

card.name: Ultimus, Divine Law Elemental
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When this creature is destroyed, search your deck. You may take a spell that has "Shield Trigger" from your deck, show that spell to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
